course_description: Every semester. Credit, two to four hours. For students concentrating in French. Registration for this course is permitted only in the semester in which the student expects to complete requirements.
prerequisites: FREN 310, FREN 314 and two 300 level FREN courses, or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
